comments.content:
For future reference, please post identification requests to the Type ID portion of this board:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20141015155157/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

The font is Gunplay, inspired by the 1972 Steve McQueen movie The Getaway:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/gunplay/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141015155157/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/gunplay/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/gunplay/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141015155157im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Gunplay_6615.png)
